dmca.title: Can't Get It Right
dmca.body:
To: Headlight Software, Inc.:

We bring to your attention that your commercial download software is infringing on our exclusive rights. Your company is not licensed to copy or display our copyrighted material located on our server at http://starprose.com.

We have attempted to block GetRight from downloading our copyrighted material, but your software breaks our security measures.

Based upon the foregoing, to avoid the possibility of legal action, we hereby demand that you confirm to us in writing within ten days of receipt of this letter that:  (i) you have removed the ability of GetRight to download from our server, starprose.com. (ii) you will refrain from making any similar software that downloads our copyrighted material in the future. Please notify us via paper or electronic mail of your response so that we may confirm that the infringing search results are no longer present.

The foregoing is without waiver of any and all rights of StarProse Corporation, all of which are expressly reserved herein.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

StarProse Corporation
PO BOX 320
Hemlock, MI 48626
